name: Sochi Ski Jumping 3D - Winter Sports Free Version
name_original: Sochi Ski Jumping 3D - Winter Sports Free Version
description:
This game is tribute to Kamil Stoch - polish ski jumper who won 2 gold medals in 2014 in Sochi, Russia. It's the 3D simulation of competition on normal hill (K-95) and large hill (K-125) in Krasnaya Polyana, Russia.

It is one touch simulation, but all 4 elements of ski jumping (start, jump, flight and landing) need to be done in a most effective way to beat the highest score.

Global leaderboards via Game Center are available.

Enjoy the best ski jumping simulation on mobile platform!
